Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.impl.billExpense

Class BillExpenseDistributionService

java.lang.Object
ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.impl.billExpense.BillExpenseDistributionService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBillExpenseDistributionService
@Service public class BillExpenseDistributionService extends Object implements IBillExpenseDistributionService
Service class for managing distribution for BillRecord.

    • distributeNonIndividualExpense

      public void distributeNonIndividualExpense(BillRecordModel billRecordModel, ExpenseModel expenseModel, Integer totalSize, Integer paramCreateUser)
      Distributes non-individual expenses proportionally among all owners based on their field size.
      Specified by:
      distributeNonIndividualExpense in interface IBillExpenseDistributionService
      Parameters:
      billRecordModel - The BillRecord to which expenses will be added.
      expenseModel - The non-individual expense to distribute.
      totalSize - The total field size of all owners.
      paramCreateUser - User Id.

      public BigDecimal getAmountToInstall(ExpenseModel expenseModel)
      Calculates the amount to charge for each installment of an expense.

    • getProportionFieldSize

      public BigDecimal getProportionFieldSize(Integer totalFieldSize, Integer ownerFieldSize)
      Calculates the proportional field size for an owner relative to the total field size of all owners.
      Parameters:
      totalFieldSize - The total field size of all owners.
      ownerFieldSize - The field size of the specific owner.
      Returns:
      BigDecimal The proportion of the owner's field size relative to the total.

    • expensesDistribution

      public void expensesDistribution(BillExpenseOwnerModel billExpenseOwnerModel, ExpenseModel expenseModel, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, BigDecimal amount)
      Distributes the specified amount of an expense to an owner's installments, adjusting for the billing period.
      Parameters:
      billExpenseOwnerModel - The owner to whom the expense is being distributed.
      expenseModel - The expense being distributed.
      startDate - The start date of the billing period.
      endDate - The end date of the billing period.
      amount - The amount to distribute to the owner.

    • getExpenseInstallmentsFilter

      public List<ExpenseInstallmentModel> getExpenseInstallmentsFilter(List<ExpenseInstallmentModel> expenseInstallmentModels, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Filters the list of installments to only include those that fall within the specified billing period.
      Parameters:
      expenseInstallmentModels - The list of installments to filter.
      startDate - The start date of the billing period.
      endDate - The end date of the billing period.
      Returns:
      A list of ExpenseInstallmentModel that fall within the billing period.
